name: ticker
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool g_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etcâ€¦
API description: Fetches financial data for a given ticker symbol using the RapidAPI service.

t.description: The ticker symbol for the financial instrument. Examples include 'ABNB:NASDAQ', '.DJI:INDEXDJX', 'EUR-USD', and 'BTC-USD'.

gl.description: The country code to filter the search results. Defaults to 'US'.

hl.description: The language code to filter the search results. Defaults to 'en'.
